issue.title: setup.sh doesn't allow use of a ros overlay and drcsim at the same time

content.raw:
Would your use case be addressed if drcsim shipped with a .rosinstall file, similar to ROS itself?

Have a look at the `issue_43` branch.  That configures and installs `share/drcsim/.rosinstall`, which in turn chains into ROS.

You could then establish an overlay like:

    mkdir work
    rosinstall work /usr/share/drcsim [other rosinstall files]

It's different from what you asked for, but perhaps it will fit the bill.  Let me know.
